name: LittleLife
description:
LittleLife is a game about a virus which has just found its first host. Greatly it eats on everything to survive. But the host is trying to fight, attacking with different vaccines in hope of killing the intruder. In the end, it is only a matter of who is most prepared to fight and react fastest.

This is your life as a virus, so who is standing up in the end? Break through the frontiers of medical science, and fight for your survival, it is you, or the human.
